249760.name: EverQuest: Call of the Forsaken
249760.description: EverQuest is now in its 15th year of continuous development.  We bring to you the unprecedented 20th expansion, Call of the Forsaken.  This expansion brings exciting new content such as West Karana, Bixie Warfront and Neriak Fourth Gate.  As well as features such as Mercanary AA's and Heroic Adventure System.  Also look out for the several in-game items included in this latest expansion.
249760.supported_languages: 英语, 法语, 意大利语, 德语, 西班牙语 - 西班牙
